title: Cannot connect to the game
body:
Apparently after a small update to the client (70 MB) I had the internet connection error and after several restarts I managed to log in again but I cannot reconnect to the game, reconnect button doesn't even appear...
http://imgur.com/a/j3sfZ

replies.body: I'm glad to hear everything is okay now!  Was this issue happening while we prepped for the patch a few hours back or around the time of your post?
So I think I discovered the problem...I was actually playing the game without the update. How is that even possible?
